title: Hour 1 - Charles Barkley (05-26-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Charles Barkley (05-26-20)
description:
Charles Barkley tells Dan all about his golf outing from this past weekend that included Tom Brady and Tiger Woods. Charles Believes that the NBA is definitely going to play and finish this season. Barkley says the NBA champion will not have an asterisk; but says this season will be a crap shoot.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Charles Barkley tells Dan all about his golf outing from this past weekend that included Tom Brady and Tiger Woods. Charles Believes that the NBA is definitely going to play and finish this season. Barkley says the NBA champion will not have an asterisk; but says this season will be a crap shoot.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
